# forEach(_:)

**Instance Method**

Calls `body` with each element in the path.

## Declaration

```swift
func forEach(_ body: (Path.Element) -> Void)
```

## Operating over path elements

- **Path.Element**: An element of a path.
title: forEach(_:)
